title: Java Fullstack Developers.
content: QuantaLeaps is hiring Java fullstack developers with strong knowledge in Java, spring boot, Angular and NodeJs.

title: SDET-UATs
content: QuantaLeaps hiring SDET/UATs for QA roles with strong Manual testing with Web, API and mobile testing, Automation experince is plus.

title: Node Fullstack Developers
content: QuantaLeaps is looking for NodeJS fullstack developers with strong knowledge and experience in Node, Angular and HappyJS.
